DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the drug interaction of pharmacokinetics of rosuvastatin and ezetimibe.
DOC.brief_title: to Investigate the Pharmacokinetic Interactions and Safety Between Rosuvastatin and Ezetimibe in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects age between 19 and 45 singed informed consent Hypotension or hypertension has a history of allergy reaction of this drug or other drugs
